duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical leadership and guidance to the engineering team for product innovation and continuous improvement.
Drive the ideation, concept development, and prototyping of products tailored to specific OEM and industrial market needs.
Manage multiple engineering projects from concept to commercialization, ensuring timely delivery, budget adherence, and quality assurance.
Identify opportunities for process optimization, cost reduction, and performance enhancement within the engineering and product development processes.
Create and maintain comprehensive engineering documentation, including design specifications, test reports, and technical drawings.
Develop project schedules and resource allocation plans to meet business objectives.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering, Materials Science, or related field (Master's preferred)
